review: i recommend this game to sean collins
my favourite battlefield game still has a community and even some servers to play on in AUS,

fun game, nice visuals, pretty good voice acting, entertaining storyline, addictive combat, nice balance of humour and seriousness in a game, good game length for its price. probably  the best 2D side scroller game ive played
